sqlMap.select: SELECT a.STSFDG_NO, a.NTT_ID, a.BBS_ID, a.WRTER_ID, a.WRTER_NM, a.PASSWORD, a.STSFDG_CN, a.STSFDG, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNSTSFDG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND a.NTT_ID = #nttId# AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ASC LIMIT #subRecordCountPerPage# OFFSET #subFirstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(STSFDG_NO) FROM COMTNSTSFDG WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND NTT_ID = #nttId# AND USE_AT = 'Y'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSTSFDG (STSFDG_NO, NTT_ID, BBS_ID, WRTER_ID, WRTER_NM, PASSWORD, STSFDG_CN, STSFDG, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #stsfdgNo#, #nttId#, #bbsId#, #wrterId#, #wrterNm#, #stsfdgPassword#, #stsfdgCn#, #stsfdg#, 'Y', #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNSTSFDG SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE STSFDG_NO = #stsfdgNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.STSFDG_NO, a.NTT_ID, a.BBS_ID, a.WRTER_ID, a.WRTER_NM, a.PASSWORD, a.STSFDG_CN, a.STSFDG, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNSTSFDG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.STSFDG_NO = #stsfdgNo#
